mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUSER ( ID, NAME, USERID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, GENDER, EMAIL, BIRTHDATE, CAR_MANUFACTURER, CAR_MODEL ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(ID),0)+1 FROM QUSER ), #{name}, #{userid}, #{username}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{birthdate}, #{carManufacturer}, #{carModel} )
mapper.select: SELECT NAME AS name, USERID AS userid, USER_NAME AS username, PASSWORD AS password, GENDER AS gender, EMAIL AS email, BIRTHDATE AS birthdate, CAR_MANUFACTURER AS carManufacturer, CAR_MODEL AS carModel FROM QUSER WHERE USERID = #{userid} AND PASSWORD = #{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE QUSER SET USER_NAME = #{username}, PASSWORD = #{password}, GENDER = #{gender}, EMAIL = #{email}, BIRTHDATE = #{birthdate}, CAR_MANUFACTURER = #{carManufacturer}, CAR_MODEL = #{carModel} WHERE USERID = #{userid}
